overview: Music videos for Britney Spears' third album, Britney, along with other performances and special features.  On her third album the simplicity of the title belies the breadth and depth of each song, as the music deftly flows from pop to R&B, to lush balladry to funk and techno. The video illustrations of the hits "I'm A Slave 4 U" and "I'm Not A Girl, Not Yet A Woman" prove that Britney's signature style continues to cause a sensation and surprise at every turn.
title: Britney: The Videos
